targets.expr: (sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{type!="command"}[$__rate_interval]))) * on (service_name) group_right avg by (service_name) (avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}) / avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}))

sum by (set) (avg by (service_name,set) (mongodb_connections{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="current"}) * on (service_name) group_right avg by (service_name,set) (mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}/ mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}))

sum( sum( irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", type!="command"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance) * on (instance)  group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"} / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}) by (set)

sum(sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total"} or mongodb_mongod_cursors{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}) by (service_name) * on (service_name) group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"} / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{mongodb_cluster="$cluster"}) by (set)

sum by () (  max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[$__rate_interval]) )

sum by (service_name) (  max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[$__rate_interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{mongodb_cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[$__rate_interval]) )
